Package com.ikanow.aleph2.data_model.interfaces.data_import

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IEnrichmentBatchModule
    The interface enrichment developers need to implement this interface to use JARs as enrichment modules in batch mode
    IEnrichmentModuleContext  
    IEnrichmentStreamingModule
    A single element in a streaming real-time pipeline Prefer to the IEnrichmentStreamingTopology when generating highly re-usable components that can be used in very simple processing pipelines (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED)
    IEnrichmentStreamingTopology
    The interface that developers of streaming technology developers (currently in Storm) must implement in order to deploy a complete end-end streaming enrichment topology.
    IHarvestContext
    A context library that is always passed to the IHarvestTechnology module and can also be passed to the harvest library processing (TODO (ALEPH-4): need to document how, ie copy JARs into external classpath and call ContextUtils.getHarvestContext)
    IHarvestTechnologyModule
    Harvesters are responsible from taking objects in arbitrary formats over arbitrary transport protocols, and doing one of the following things: - writing JSON objects to a real-time queue provided by the context - dumping JSON/XML/CSV/Seq files in the designated HDFS directory
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IEnrichmentBatchModule.ProcessingStage
    The different types of processing stage
